meanings.sent1: She was miseating by trying to use a fork to drink soup.

meanings.definition: The act of eating incorrectly or inappropriately.
meanings.sent1: Miseating can lead to stomachaches and indigestion.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised against miseating to maintain a healthy diet.
